heritage.label: Collection
heritage.title: HERITAGE
heritage.subtitle: The Trident
heritage.description: Each frame perpetuates Parisian artisanal excellence. Timeless creations crafted in our workshops.
heritage.heroDescription: What is passed down is not discarded. What is respected is not forgotten. Three points. The past. The present. The future.
heritage.seoDescription: Discover the Heritage collection by RENAISSANCE Paris. Luxury eyewear with timeless design, blending tradition and modernity. Crafted with the finest materials.

versailles.label: Collection
versailles.title: VERSAILLES
versailles.subtitle: The Fleur de Lys
versailles.description: Inspired by the opulence of the palace, each frame captures the essence of French luxury.
versailles.heroDescription: The kings have gone. The symbol remains. The Fleur de Lys. For those who build. Not for those who parade.
versailles.seoDescription: Discover the Versailles collection by RENAISSANCE Paris. French elegance embodied in refined luxury eyewear, inspired by the Palace of Versailles.

isis.label: Collection
isis.title: ISIS
isis.subtitle: The Cobra. The Scarab. The Eye.
isis.description: What has endured for 5,000 years is not worn by chance. A collection inspired by the eternal symbols of ancient Egypt.
isis.heroDescription: Eternity is worn daily. The Cobra, the Scarab, the Eye. What has endured for 5,000 years is not worn by chance.
isis.seoDescription: Discover the Isis collection by RENAISSANCE Paris. Bold luxury eyewear inspired by the Egyptian goddess, blending mystery and refinement.
isis.comingSoonDescription: The ISIS collection is currently in preparation. Soon discover frames inspired by the eternal symbols of ancient Egypt, where French craftsmanship meets millennial mystery.

page.seoDescription: Explore all RENAISSANCE Paris collections. Heritage, Versailles and Isis: luxury eyewear crafted in France with exceptional artisanal know-how.
